about_the_game:
Warning: 2 gamepads are required to play.

In the city of NeoFuturistTown anarchy reigns.
The big barons of the underworld have taken control of the city and have been fighting for many years over the territories through internal wars.
To put an end to these confrontations in the middle of the street, a brilliant inventor proposed to settle the conflicts by triad ball matches. A sport created by this man of science. To do this, he created impulse suits that attracted opponents and allowed them to propel themselves on balls of energy.

The goal of the game was to score 5 goals to the opposing camp to win the conflict. Since that day, no more confrontations took place in the street...

In triad ball, a student game, the players compete in 1 vs 1 in side view

- You must score 5 goals to win the game.
- Players can propel themselves on the energy balls present on the field and attract their opponents.
- Hit the ball to change its direction
- Teleport to get back to the cages
- Jump and double jump and move around the field

(Students Game)
